title: 2018년 Victor H. Diaz III v. State 사건
summary: 미국 Texas, TX 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Victor H. Diaz III v. State. 판결일: 2018-10-04. 법원: Court of Appeals of Texas.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Victor H. Diaz III v. State
**판결일**: 2018-10-04
**법원**: Court of Appeals of Texas
**관할**: Texas, TX


## 판결문 요약

                            Fourth Court of Appeals
                                   San Antonio, Texas
                                         October 4, 2018

                                      No. 04-18-00606-CR

                                       Victor H. DIAZ III,
                                            Appellant

                                                v.

                                     The STATE of Texas,
                                           Appellee

                  From the 186th Judicial District Court, Bexar County, Texas
                                Trial Court No. 2017CR6123
                         Honorable Jefferson Moore, Judge Presiding


                                         ORDER

        Appellant entered into a plea bargain with the State, pursuant to which appellant pleaded
nolo contendere to the offense of burglary of a habitation with the intent to commit assault. The
trial court imposed sentence in accordance with the agreement and signed a certificate stating
this “is a plea-bargain case, and the defendant has NO right of appeal.” The certification further
states this “is one in which the defendant has waived the right of appeal.” See TEX. R. APP. P.
25.2(a)(2). Appellant timely filed a notice of appeal. The clerk’s record, which includes the trial
court’s rule 25.2(a)(2) certification and a written plea bargain agreement, has been filed. See id.
R. 25.2(d). This court must dismiss an appeal “if a certifica...
